wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Hugo Meggeson Hood DSO, CdG (27 August 1915 – 1 August 1968), known as Hugo Hood, was an English war hero, schoolmaster and, for one game, a first-class cricketer. He was a left-arm bowler who played for Somerset. He was born at Burnby, Pocklington, Yorkshire and died in Scarborough.
